Agamoni - vill Bholarkhas under Chotoguma GP | Riverine area of River Gangadhar at vill Bholarkhas under Chotoguma GP is getting eroded. Village : Bholarkhas River: Gangadhar GP : Chotoguma Incident date : 01/08/2022 to 03/08/2022 Time : 3.00 pm Land : 0 bigha 2 khata 10 Lessa Household affected : 5 Population affected : 35 The affected families has shifted their houses by themselves to another place. GPS Coordinate : Lat. 26.3078053. Long. 89.8036509 Due to the sudden rise of water level Of River Gangadhar the agricultural land is getting affected. The water level of river Gangadhar is below danger level. | 35
